View Javadoc
1   package org.infinispan.configuration.cache;
2   
3   import static org.infinispan.configuration.cache.AbstractStoreConfiguration.PROPERTIES;
4   import static org.infinispan.configuration.cache.ClusterLoaderConfiguration.REMOTE_CALL_TIMEOUT;
5   
6   import java.util.Properties;
7   import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
8   
9   import org.infinispan.commons.util.TypedProperties;
10  import org.infinispan.configuration.parsing.XmlConfigHelper;
11  
12  public class ClusterLoaderConfigurationBuilder extends AbstractStoreConfigurationBuilder<ClusterLoaderConfiguration, ClusterLoaderConfigurationBuilder> {
13  
14     public ClusterLoaderConfigurationBuilder(PersistenceConfigurationBuilder builder) {
15        super(builder, ClusterLoaderConfiguration.attributeDefinitionSet());
16     }
17  
18     @Override
19     public ClusterLoaderConfigurationBuilder self() {
20        return this;
21     }
22  
23     public ClusterLoaderConfigurationBuilder remoteCallTimeout(long remoteCallTimeout) {
24        attributes.attribute(REMOTE_CALL_TIMEOUT).set(remoteCallTimeout);
25        return this;
26     }
27  
28     public ClusterLoaderConfigurationBuilder remoteCallTimeout(long remoteCallTimeout, TimeUnit unit) {
29        remoteCallTimeout(unit.toMillis(remoteCallTimeout));
30        return this;
31     }
32  
33     @Override
34     public ClusterLoaderConfigurationBuilder withProperties(Properties p) {
35        attributes.attribute(PROPERTIES).set(TypedProperties.toTypedProperties(p));
36        XmlConfigHelper.setAttributes(attributes, p, false, true);
37        return this;
38     }
39  
40     @Override
41     public void validate() {
42     }
43  
44     @Override
45     public ClusterLoaderConfiguration create() {
46        return new ClusterLoaderConfiguration(attributes.protect(), async.create(), singletonStore.create());
47     }
48  
49     @Override
50     public ClusterLoaderConfigurationBuilder read(ClusterLoaderConfiguration template) {
51        super.read(template);
52        return this;
53     }
54  }
